meanings.definition: Administered with too small a dose.
meanings.sent1: The underdosed medicine did not help the patient feel better.
meanings.sent2: The doctor realized the underdosed prescription was the reason for the lack of improvement.
meanings.sent3: The underdosed cake was not sweet enough for the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: Her underdosed efforts in the race left her far behind the other runners.
meanings.sent5: The underdosed plant did not grow as tall as its well-fed neighbors.

meanings.definition: Not given enough of a medication or substance.
meanings.sent1: The underdosed patient did not receive the full benefits of the treatment.
meanings.sent2: The underdosed fertilizer resulted in stunted plant growth.
meanings.sent3: The underdosed car ran out of gas halfway through the journey.
meanings.sent4: His underdosed enthusiasm for the project led to incomplete results.
meanings.sent5: The underdosed shampoo left her hair looking greasy and unwashed.
